thread.section_title: The Nadler Victoria - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great, Centrally Located London Hotel
thread.title_full: Great, Centrally Located London Hotel - Review of The Nadler Victoria, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Mike R
title: Great, Centrally Located London Hotel
text:
Was in London for a few days in business and this place fit the bill! Modern rooms, and centrally located. A 10 minute walk to the QEII Conference Cener and walking distance to Sohi, West End, Buckingham Palace and most of the "must see" sites.
Also within walking distance to at least a half dozen pubs :-).
